11445Crystallography ReportsCrystallogr. Rep.1063-77451562-689XSP MAIK Nauka/InterperiodicaDordrechtS1063774512010117758510.1134/S1063774512010117Structure of Organic CompoundsCrystal structure of complexes of bivalent Co, Ni, and Cd with anions of benzoic and 2-(acetylamino)-5-nitrobenzoic acidsRzaevaM. F.1AskerovR. K.2MovsumovE. M.1SergienkoV. S.3IlyukhinA. B.3Azerbaijan State Agricultural Universitypr. Atatyurka 262AZ2000GanjaAzerbaijangrid.37600.320000000110109948Baku State Universityul. Zahida Khalilova 23AZ1000BakuAzerbaijangrid.4886.20000000121929124Kurnakov Institute of General and Inorganic ChemistryRussian Academy of SciencesLeninskii pr. 31119991MoscowRussia3420123201257220821231320121372010342012© Pleiades Publishing, Ltd. 20122012Abstract

The structure of three complexes of bivalent metals (cobalt, nickel, and cadmium) with anions of benzoic (HL1) and 2-(acetylamino)-5-nitrobenzoic (HL2) acids, namely, [Co21 (H2O)2(μ-C4H4N2)]n (I), [NiL2(H2O)5]L2 · 2H2O (II), and [Cd(μ-L2)2(H2O)2]n · 2nH2O (III), is determined. In chainlike structure I, cobalt atoms are connected by bridging pyrazine molecules; structure II contains isolated complexes. In structure III, centrosymmetric (CdOCO)2 cycles and polymeric ribbons are formed due to the coordination of the carboxylate group of the L2 ligand to two cadmium atoms.

elements.clean_text:
Abstract

The structure of three complexes of bivalent metals (cobalt, nickel, and cadmium) with anions of benzoic (HL1) and 2-(acetylamino)-5-nitrobenzoic (HL2) acids, namely, [Co21 (H2O)2(μ-C4H4N2)]n (I), [NiL2(H2O)5]L2 ⋅ 2H2O (II), and [Cd(μ-L2)2(H2O)2]n ⋅ 2nH2O (III), is determined. In chainlike structure I, cobalt atoms are connected by bridging pyrazine molecules; structure II contains isolated complexes. In structure III, centrosymmetric (CdOCO)2 cycles and polymeric ribbons are formed due to the coordination of the carboxylate group of the L2 ligand to two cadmium atoms.

metadata.title: Crystal structure of complexes of bivalent Co, Ni, and Cd with anions of benzoic and 2-(acetylamino)-5-nitrobenzoic acids
